institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 18 (Performance Evaluation)
contents: Article 18 (Performance Evaluation) ① The Chairman of the Board may conduct a performance evaluation of supported companies based on the project completion report for the current year. ② The Chairman of the Board may use the results of the performance evaluation to grant incentives to excellent companies and support reduction of post-subsidy funds for underperforming organizations, etc. Follow-up measures may be taken. ③ Matters such as composition of the evaluation committee, detailed evaluation indicators, incentives, etc. shall be determined separately by the chairman.
